nodes.text: The Galactic Tourist Bureau (GTB) was an organization of travel agencies that include Star Tours, Air Alderaan, Bespin Direct, Dantooine Express, Naboo Spacelines and Tatooine Transit. Each agency maintained spaceliner terminals at Spaceport THX1138 in the months before the Battle of Yavin.
This organization was mentioned only in an advertisement on the video screen found exclusively in the queue of Star Tours: The Adventures Continue at Tokyo Disneyland.
